titles.title: A concurrent resolution correcting the enrollment of the bill H.R. 3.

action.text: Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.
Received in the Senate and referred to the Committee on Banking.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: 5/4/1988--Introduced. Makes corrections in the enrollment of H.R. 3 (trade law revisions) as it concerns a review to assess whether existing restrictions on the export of U.S. crude oil are adequate to protect the energy and national security interests of the United States and American consumers.
